name: Royal Princess - Salon Games For Girls
name_original: Royal Princess - Salon Games For Girls
description:
Armored Techno Solution Comes With The Latest Surprise this time for Princess games . makeup your Doll like a princess of the king and play with the cute dresses and makeup kit.

Hello girls. Get ready to play a new game with a royal princess. In this game your mission is to help royal princess with the Makeup. Touch the screen, In this game we included many fun activities for you, In this Royal Princess spa game you can experience the royal treatment. So, play and enjoy this princess salon spa game and share with your friends.

Take the princess to the spa for facial treatment. Cleanse, exfoliate and moisturize her skin to bring out her natural beauty. Give her a soothing cucumber mask and take some time to trim her eyebrows.
After the spa, head over to the salon for makeup time! Apply lipstick, eyeliner and mascara. Brighten her cheeks with a warm colored blush and don’t forget the highlighter to bring out her eyes. Pick an adorable hairstyle for the pretty princess then go to your royal closet to find the perfect outfit!

Select from beautiful gowns and dresses to find the best look. It’s really up to you in this exciting game. They’ll look awesome for their day on the town!

prepare your princess for tonight party or for the music concert and have fun with the friend.
